title: She Walks These Hills
description: In the Appalachian community of Dark Hollow, Tennessee, some believe that the ghost of Katie Wyler, kidnapped by the Shawnee two hundred years ago, is once again roaming the hills. Only an old woman gifted with "the Sight" and policewoman Martha Ayers can put the superstitions to restâ€”and stop a flesh-and-blood predator as elusive as the whistling wind...
author: Sharyn McCrumb
